content:
Joao Marques-Silva is a Research Chair at ANITI, University of Toulouse. His research interests include automated reasoning, artificial intelligence and machine learning. Before joining ANITI, Joao Marques-Silva was affiliated with University College Dublin, the University of Southampton, and with the University of Lisbon. At ANITI, he is Research Chair on Deep Learner Verification and Optimization.
